rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" />   <entry>     <title>Plutarch & Sparta colloquium</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/classics/events/2015/plutarch--sparta-colloquium.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Nicola Caseldine</name>     </author>     <summary>In recognition of the fundamental interconnection of Plutarch and Sparta, the University will host a colloquium bringing together expert scholars from both fields to explore how historical and literary specialists can learn from each other.</summary>     <published>2015-01-06T11:48:00Z</published>
